access_token_expiration.name: access_token_expiration
access_token_expiration.description: Defines the access token expiration in seconds

active_session_timeout.name: active_session_timeout
active_session_timeout.description: Specify how long (seconds) a user is allowed to work continuously in the account

allowed_ip_addresses.name: allowed_ip_addresses
allowed_ip_addresses.description: List of the IP addresses and subnets from which IAM tokens can be created for the account.

api_creation.name: api_creation
api_creation.description: When restriction is enabled, only users, including the account owner, assigned the User API key creator role on the IAM Identity Service can create API keys. Allowed values are 'RESTRICTED', 'NOT_RESTRICTED', or 'NOT_SET' (to 'unset' a previous set value).

enforce_allowed_ip_addresses.name: enforce_allowed_ip_addresses
enforce_allowed_ip_addresses.description: If true IP address restriction will be enforced, If false, traffic originated outside specified allowed IP address set is monitored with audit events sent to SIEM and Activity Tracker. After running in monitored mode to test this variable, it should then explicitly be set to true to enforce IP allow listing.

inactive_session_timeout.name: inactive_session_timeout
inactive_session_timeout.description: Specify how long (seconds) a user is allowed to stay logged in the account while being inactive/idle

max_sessions_per_identity.name: max_sessions_per_identity
max_sessions_per_identity.description: Defines the maximum allowed sessions per identity required by the account. Supports any whole number greater than '0', or 'NOT_SET' to unset account setting and use service default.

mfa.name: mfa
mfa.description: Specify Multi-Factor Authentication method in the account. Supported valid values are 'NONE' (No MFA trait set), 'TOTP' (For all non-federated IBMId users), 'TOTP4ALL' (For all users), 'LEVEL1' (Email based MFA for all users), 'LEVEL2' (TOTP based MFA for all users), 'LEVEL3' (U2F MFA for all users).
mfa.options: NONE, TOTP, TOTP4ALL, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3

private_endpoint.name: private_endpoint
private_endpoint.description: To enable/disable the private endpoint in the account public access.

public_access_enabled.name: public_access_enabled
public_access_enabled.description: Enable/Disable public access group in which resources are open anyone regardless if they are member of your account or not

refresh_token_expiration.name: refresh_token_expiration
refresh_token_expiration.description: Defines the refresh token expiration in seconds

serviceid_creation.name: serviceid_creation
serviceid_creation.description: When restriction is enabled, only users, including the account owner, assigned the Service ID creator role on the IAM Identity Service can create service IDs. Allowed values are 'RESTRICTED', 'NOT_RESTRICTED', or 'NOT_SET' (to 'unset' a previous set value).

shell_settings_enabled.name: shell_settings_enabled
shell_settings_enabled.description: Enable global shell settings to all users in the account

account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mod.name: account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mode
account_allowed_ip_addresses_control_mod.description: Current allowed IP addresses enforcement control mode, will indicate RESTRICT if account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced is TRUE

account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced.name: enforce_allowed_ip_addresses
account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced.description: If true IP address restriction will be enforced, If false, traffic originated outside specified allowed IP address set is monitored with audit events sent to SIEM and Activity Tracker. After running in monitored mode to test this variable, it should then explicitly be set to true to enforce IP allow listing.

account_iam_apikey_creation.name: account_iam_apikey_creation
account_iam_apikey_creation.description: Current state of API key creation restriction

account_iam_serviceid_creation.name: account_iam_serviceid_creation
account_iam_serviceid_creation.description: Current state of ServiceID creation restriction

account_public_access.name: account_public_access
account_public_access.description: Current state of public access group setting

account_shell_settings_status.name: account_shell_settings_status
account_shell_settings_status.description: Current state of global shell setting
